name: find_domestic_flights
description: Find and present top domestic flight results with airline, price, and departure time.

origin.description: IATA airport code or city name for flight origin

destination.description: IATA airport code or city name for flight destination

departure_date.description: Date of departure in YYYY-MM-DD format

return_date.description: Return date in YYYY-MM-DD format, if searching for roundtrip

max_results.description: Maximum number of top results to present
